project_context.name: KOVA
project_context.positioning: Premium alternative to Vercel, but not serverless

design_philosophy.inspiration: Swiss design, premium CLI tools, architect portfolios

primary_color.usage: EXTREMELY SPARINGLY - only for critical state indicators and primary CTA buttons
primary_color.rule: Less than 5% of the interface should use this color

typography.primary_font: Default system fonts with clean, modern feel
typography.code_font: Monospace for technical elements, terminal commands, and data

login_screen.layout: Split screen - left side branding/features, right side form
login_screen.form_style: Minimal inputs with underline borders or clean rounded borders
login_screen.branding: Large "deployctl" with emerald accent on "ctl" only

dashboard.header: Clean title with minimal stats, single primary CTA button
dashboard.project_cards: Dark cards with subtle borders, minimal emerald accents
dashboard.color_restriction: Use emerald ONLY for live status dots and main deploy button

buttons.primary: Emerald background, white text, subtle shadow
buttons.secondary: Transparent with zinc border, subtle hover states

status_indicators.live: Small emerald dot with subtle pulse animation

cards.hover_effects: Subtle background change, NO color additions

background_treatment.pattern: Extremely subtle dot pattern using emerald at 2-5% opacity
background_treatment.gradients: Minimal gradients from slate-950 to emerald-950 at very low opacity
background_treatment.blur_orbs: Large, subtle blur circles in emerald at 3% opacity maximum

critical_restrictions.color_overuse: NEVER use emerald for multiple elements on the same screen
critical_restrictions.bright_colors: Avoid any bright blues, purples, oranges, or reds
critical_restrictions.gradients: No rainbow gradients or multiple color gradients

interaction_design.hover_states: Subtle, refined, mostly opacity and scale changes
interaction_design.focus_states: Clean emerald borders or subtle emerald glows

what_not_to_do.avoid_colors: No blues, purples, oranges, or multiple accent colors
what_not_to_do.avoid_patterns: No busy backgrounds or complex patterns
what_not_to_do.avoid_overdesign: No unnecessary visual elements or decorations
what_not_to_do.avoid_color_spam: Don't use emerald for icons, text, borders everywhere

success_criteria.looks_expensive: Should feel like premium software worth $500/month
success_criteria.developer_focused: Appeals to senior developers and technical leaders
success_criteria.distinctly_minimal: Stands out from typical SaaS rainbow dashboards
